channel.title: I hate srl because all it does is give me problems but if someone can help?
channel.description: i get this error [code] Failed when compiling Line 26: [Error] (7143:1): Unknown identifier 'GameTab' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\skill\WoodCutting.scar [/code] when i use [code] {.include srl\srl\skill\WoodCutting.scar} [/code] so if someone can help me with this problem that would be greatt [b] BETTER [/b] than frosted flakes!

item.source: I hate srl because all it does is give me problems but if someone can help?

item.title: I hate srl because all it does is give me problems but if someone can help?
item.dc:creator: @pistolbob pistolbob
item.description:
@pistolbob wrote:

[scar]
program New;
{.include squig.txt}
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\WoodCutting.scar}

var

trees :integer;
x,y :integer;
const
wood = 3033953;
procedure check;
begin
if(isUpText(‘Chop down’)) then
clickmouse(x,y,true)
else
findcolorspiral(x,y,4685936,1,1,512,336)

end;

procedure findtree4;
begin
wait(9000)
findcolorspiral(x,y,4685936,1,1,512,336)
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(1000)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
end;

procedure DropWood;
begin
findcolorspiral(x,y,wood,812,336,985,577)
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(300+random(200))
clickmouse(x,y,false)

end;

begin
repeat
SetupSRL;
findtree4;
check;
DropWood;
until(false)

end.
[/scar]
i know the drop wont work thats why i need srl

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

pistolbob:

ooo right how do i do that? in the main loop just put SetUpSRL;?

put
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
underneath your program name and then put
SetupSRL;
in main loop at begining.

[scar]program New;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

blah blah blah

begin
setupSRL;
blah blah blah
end.[/scar]
